name: CLCircularRegion
desc: A circular geographic region, specified as a center point and radius.

items.name: init(center: CLLocationCoordinate2D, radius: CLLocationDistance, identifier: String)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a region object defining a circular geographic area.

items.name: var center: CLLocationCoordinate2D
items.desc: The center point of the geographic area.

items.name: var radius: CLLocationDistance

items.name: func contains(CLLocationCoordinate2D) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the geographic area contains the specified coordinate.
